GitJournal

This is a repository of GitJournal to be used with F-Droid.

Currently it serves 2 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://gitjournal.io/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
E2 EE 4A A4 38 0F 0D 3B 3C F8 1E B1 7F 5E 48 F8 27 C3 AA 77 12 2D 9A D3 30 CC 44 16 50 89 45 74
